Name: Grounds For Divorce
Ingredients: 4 wedge Pineapple (fresh) cored, skinned and chopped
Instructions: MUDDLE pineapple in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine stain into chilled glass.
Review: Vanilla and herbal notes with pineapple and tequila.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Jasper de Graaf.
